hero.title: The Company That Exists Because Developers Kept Ghosting Us
hero.description: Aviniti started when our founder spent $9,000 on developers who never delivered. Now we build the apps we wish someone had built for us.

founder.label: Our Story
founder.title: From Getting Scammed to Building the Company
founder.name: Ali Odat
founder.paragraph_1: Before Aviniti, I was a field coordinator for World Vision — a Canadian NGO — at the Za'atari refugee camp in Jordan. I was the highest-ranking staff member on-site, managing four industrial kitchens, 24 employees, and 300 Syrian workers producing 20,000 meals a day. Good salary, great benefits, stable career. I'm a civil engineer by training. I had zero background in code.
founder.paragraph_2: In 2018, I had an idea for a car services app — a platform where you could buy, finance, insure, and maintain your car all in one place, with built-in calculators for every bank and insurance company. I started looking for developers to build it. The first team said it would cost $60,000–$70,000. I had $15,000–$20,000. So I went offshore — India, Egypt, freelancers. I spent close to $9,000 across three different developers. Every single one stopped answering my calls. No product. No code. Nothing.
founder.paragraph_3: The last developer I hired used Flutter, so I started learning the basics just to check his work. Then COVID hit. Three months in quarantine with nothing to do. I taught myself to code — religiously, every day. By 2021, I could build an app. Slow, full of bugs, but functional. I quit World Vision, started delivering perfume packages with a friend just to pay the bills, and kept coding. I caught the AI wave early — one of the first 10,000 ChatGPT users. I've been building with Google AI products since Gemini was still called Bard.
founder.paragraph_4: I registered Aviniti in 2025. The company exists because I know exactly what it feels like to have an idea, spend your savings on developers who disappear, and have nothing to show for it. That's why we give you an AI-powered estimate before you spend a dollar, why we show you weekly progress, and why we don't ghost. Ever.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: We build custom AI-powered apps for businesses that need more than a template
mission.description: Based in Amman, Jordan, we combine local market understanding with world-class engineering to ship apps that work.

values.title: Speed Without Shortcuts
values.description: We deliver fast by cutting bloat, not quality. No endless meetings, no scope creep. Clear timelines you can count on.

values.title: AI-First, Not AI-Fake
values.description: We don't slap 'AI-powered' on everything. We architect real AI from day one — computer vision in SkinVerse, diagnostics in HairVision, product analysis in Calibre.

values.title: Honesty Over Hype
values.description: We give you realistic estimates and stick to them. If something won't work, we'll tell you before you spend money on it.

values.title: Built in Jordan, Trusted Regionally
values.description: Amman-based team. Serving businesses across Jordan and the MENA region. We understand the market because we live in it.

approach.label: Our Approach
approach.title: From Discovery to Scale
approach.description: We handle everything from feasibility validation to production deployment and growth.

steps.title: Discovery & Estimation
steps.description: Our AI tools validate feasibility and give you a real cost estimate before we write a line of code.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Iterative prototyping in Figma. You see and approve every screen before development starts.

steps.title: Build
steps.description: Agile sprints with weekly demos. You see progress every week, not just at the end.

steps.title: Deploy & Support
steps.description: We handle App Store submission, analytics setup, and stay for bug fixes, iterations, and growth.

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Great?
